chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Dark One's Touch
chapters.info: Kairen Stang, p. 123—Aes Sedai of the Blue Ajah. She grew up in Andor. She was part of Salidar's embassy to Rand, and later traveled with the Tower in exile outside Tar Valon. She was strong in Earth, and was one of the sisters Egwene had making cuendillar ornaments. Egwene had planned to use Kairen and Leane for the special mission to turn the harbor chains to cuendillar, but she was killed shortly before the mission took place. Her assassin is unknown, but strong suspicion is cast upon Aran'gar.
